🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Personal finance management, including tracking expenses, income, and budgeting.
📅 Created: Jun 2014 • Updated: Oct 2025

✅ Budgets
✅ Categories
✅ Tags

Firefly III is a self-hosted personal finance manager that helps users track expenses and income to improve budgeting and saving habits. It supports features like budgets, categories, tags, recurring transactions, and offers a REST JSON API for extensive control and integration.

The AI Video Transcriber is an open-source tool that transcribes and summarizes video content from various platforms like YouTube and TikTok. It uses AI for speech-to-text conversion, text optimization, and multi-language summarization, offering a mobile-friendly interface and real-time progress tracking.

The Decart-XR repository is a Unity application that enables real-time AI-powered video transformation on Meta Quest 3 devices. It allows users to experience live inside AI-generated art with low latency, utilizing Decart AI's video-to-video transformation system optimized for VR applications.

🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Streamlining command-line workflows through intelligent alias management and suggestions.
📅 Created: Jul 2025 • Updated: Oct 2025

✅ Intelligent alias suggestions based on command history

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

Alman is a command-line tool and TUI for managing shell aliases. It provides intelligent suggestions based on command history, helping users organize, create, and manage aliases across multiple shells, ultimately improving command-line workflow and productivity.

𝗩𝗜𝗥𝗦𝗛𝗟𝗘 | Managing and provisioning virtual machines from the command line using configuration files.  🔥 Super Hot!

❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 🦀 Rust 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Managing and provisioning virtual machines from the command line using configuration files.
📅 Created: Aug 2024 • Updated: Oct 2025

❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ VM management via command-line interface
✅ TOML-based VM template definitions
✅ Integration with cloud-hypervisor and linux-kvm
✅ Network configuration using openvswitch
✅ Fast VM provisioning with pipelight-init
✅ Client-server architecture for managing VMs on multiple nodes


❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖

❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

Virshle is a command-line utility written in Rust for managing virtual machines. It leverages cloud-hypervisor and linux-kvm for virtualization, openvswitch for network configuration, and pipelight-init for fast VM provisioning. It allows users to define VM templates in TOML files and manage VMs through a client-server architecture.

Palettum is a versatile tool for recoloring images, GIFs, and videos using custom palettes. It offers both a web application and a command-line interface (CLI) for applying palettes, with options for pixel-perfect snapping or smooth blending effects.

YouTubeTLDR is a lightweight, self-hosted tool that uses Gemini AI to summarize YouTube videos. It allows users to quickly get the essence of a video without watching the entire content, focusing on privacy and minimal resource usage.

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

The 'sim' repository is an open-source platform designed to build and deploy AI agent workflows. It allows users to create and manage AI agents for various automation and chatbot applications, leveraging technologies like Next.js and TypeScript for a low-code/no-code experience.
